mapper.select: select u.username,role_name role,ttl from User u inner join userrole ur on ur.uid=u.uid inner join role r on r.role_id=ur.role_id where u.username=#{username}
mapper.update: update userrole ur set ur.role_id=(select r.role_id from role r where r.role_name='user'), ttl=null where UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ttl) <= #{time}
